channel.title: Need Help With Getting Client To Work With Delta!
channel.description:
Right Everyone, i got a source of Blurr's Client, Ive still got all credits to him cause hes awesome ive changed the ip and everything and when i try to connect to my server on the client, it logs me in the straight back out?, my other client works fine, but i was wondering how i would get this client to work with the source
any ideas?
Thanks Ihom

item.title: Need Help With Getting Client To Work With Delta!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Oh, one second… NVM, I helped you on MSN. =D

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Getting Client To Work With Delta!

item.title: Need Help With Getting Client To Work With Delta!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“ihom, post:7, topic:251180”]Player.java:1152: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable skulls
location: class Player
playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
^
Player.java:1153: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable hints
location: class Player
playerProps.writeByte(hints);
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You declare the Boolean/INT, However it is used.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Getting Client To Work With Delta!

item.description:
@ihom wrote:

Player.java:1152: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable skulls
location: class Player
playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
^
Player.java:1153: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable hints
location: class Player
playerProps.writeByte(hints);
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need Help With Getting Client To Work With Delta!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

I think you need to add another playerprops writebyte, try these;

playerProps.writeByte(skulls); playerProps.writeByte(hints);
I think… If it doesn’t work tell me and I’ll investigate more.
Under;

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

In Player.java.

Read full topic

or you can just remove the bhicon loading away… because the reason for disconnecting is that, because your server isint configured for bhicons

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:
